description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，汉族，中国共产党党员。中华人民共和国第十三届全国人民代表大会四川地区代表。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Han ethnicity and a member of the Communist Party of China. He is a delegate representing the Sichuan region to the 13th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A province-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省广元市下辖的县。
description.en: A county under the administration of Guangyuan, Sichuan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党执政。
description.en: A country in East Asia governed by the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest organ of state power of the People's Republic of China.
Li Jun is from Cangxi, Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 李君是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Li Jun is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年2月24日，李君当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会四川地区代表。
description.en: On February 24, 2018, Li Jun was elected as a delegate representing the Sichuan region to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 李君的国籍是中华人民共和国。
description.en: Li Jun's nationality is the People's Republic of China.
